cells.data:
# Implementation

## Arguments

* data: Data
* refLifeTable: RefLifeTable
* causeDeletedRef: CauseDeletedRef obj
* riskFactor: string


1. Create a life table with the data and refLifeTable argument
2. Create a life table with the data argument and refLifeTable but all datum replaced with those in the causeDeletedRef for the riskFactor argument
3. Subtract the ex values from the 2 life table rows whose age column matches with the age datum in the data argument
4. Return the value

# Chaining Notes

* Is unlocked when the addLifeTable method is used 
* Is only relevant for the MPoRT algorithm
* Algorithm json now has causeDeletedReference object which is built using [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oDcl0Ed-KElO_a_DBWcontVnqyTCZlT63hSPd-gId88/edit#gid=1093053789)
* Modify buildFromAssetsFolder to take into account cause-delete-reference.json file
* Modify buildFromAlgorithmJson to add causeDeletedReference 
* Add .ts and .js file in pbl-calculator-engine-assets folder under mport folder which has the allowable values for riskFactor
